00022 // Assumption:
00023 // all [in], [in, out] and [out, retval] pointers must be valid: the implementation has no need to validate them
00024 // all [out] pointers may be NULL pointers: the implementation must not assign any values in such case

00030 enum TRANS_MODES
00031 {
00032         TRANS_REGULAR = 0,                      
00033         TRANS_INVERTED = 1,                     
00034         TRANS_RIGHT_SIDE = 2,           
00035         TRANS_LEFT_SIDE = 4,            
00036         TRANS_BOTH_SIDES = TRANS_RIGHT_SIDE | TRANS_LEFT_SIDE,  
00037         TRANS_RIGHT_SIDE_INVERTED = TRANS_RIGHT_SIDE | TRANS_INVERTED,  
00038         TRANS_BOTH_SIDES_INVERTED = TRANS_BOTH_SIDES | TRANS_INVERTED,  
00039 
00040         TRANS_MASK = 7                          
00041 };
